column4: forum':platforms where people can exchange information, Q&A platforms

column3: repl:editors, converters, calculators and things that transform data inputs into a different format

column6: example: unpersonalised platforms that offer a systematic, progressive, continue and specific learning program, or platforms that host those program

column7: journal:written content; CMS or any other platform to post articles; books or list of books offered for free; if offering tutorials, those are not organised in a systematic, progressive format, can be about different topics and offer room for unrelated content

column8: app:pages about API, libraries, etc; including main land pages where the resource is described and even some documentation

column4: theme:platforms which content consists on the offer of templates and similar

column6: enterprise:when referring to companies, associations or organisations of people offering services/products, but not e-commerce or PaaS/SaaS services

column3: docs:material oriented to instruct developers in the use of a technology; manifestos, protocols, etc

column1: SENGINE:search tools: search engine tools or pages used to search EXTERNAL resources, not registered in owned databases
